languages.text: "Во имя блага сектора Вольные Торговцы должны стать примером соблюдения закона, а не исключением из него. Но многие ли обладатели {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патентов{/g} поступают так? Нет!"

traits.locale_text: "Во имя блага сектора Вольные Торговцы должны стать примером соблюдения закона, а не исключением из него. Но многие ли обладатели Патентов поступают так? Нет!"

languages.text: "For the good of the sector, Rogue Traders must become paragons of the law, not exceptions to it. But do many {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} holders exhibit lawful conduct? No, they do not!"
languages.original_text: "Во имя блага сектора Вольные Торговцы должны стать примером соблюдения закона, а не исключением из него. Но многие ли обладатели {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патентов{/g} поступают так? Нет!"

traits.locale_text: "For the good of the sector, Rogue Traders must become paragons of law, not exceptions from it. But are there many Warrant holders who act this way? No!"
"For the good of the sector, Rogue Traders must become paragons of law, not exceptions from it. But are there many Warrant holders who act this way? No!"
"For the good of the sector, Rogue Traders must become paragons of the law, not exceptions to it. But do many {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} holders exhibit lawful conduct? No, they do not!"
"For the good of the sector, Rogue Traders must become paragons of the law, not exceptions to it. But do many {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} holders exhibit lawful conduct? No, they do not!"
"For the good of the sector, Rogue Traders must become paragons of the law, not exceptions to it. But do many {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} holders exhibit lawful conduct? No, they do not!"

languages.text: 「星域のためを思うならば、自由開拓者は法の例外となるのではなく、規範とならなくてはならない。しかし多くの{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}を持つ者が、法を遵守する振る舞いを示せるのでしょうか？そのようなことはないのです！」
languages.original_text: "For the good of the sector, Rogue Traders must become paragons of the law, not exceptions to it. But do many {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} holders exhibit lawful conduct? No, they do not!"

traits.locale_text: 「星域のためを思うならば、自由開拓者は法の例外となるのではなく、規範とならなくてはならない。しかし多くの{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}を持つ者が、法を遵守する振る舞いを示せるのでしょうか？そのようなことはないのです！」

languages.text: “为了整个扩区的利益，行商浪人必须成为守法的楷模，决不能胡作非为。可是，那些持有{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}授状{/g}的人，他们之中真的有很多守法之人吗？不，守法之人实在是太少了！”
languages.original_text: "For the good of the sector, Rogue Traders must become paragons of the law, not exceptions to it. But do many {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} holders exhibit lawful conduct? No, they do not!"

traits.locale_text: “为了整个扩区的利益，行商浪人必须成为守法的楷模，决不能胡作非为。可是，那些持有{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}许可证{/g}的人，他们之中真的有很多守法之人吗？不，守法之人实在是太少了！”

languages.text: «Por el bien del sector, los Comerciantes Independientes deben convertirse en ejemplares de la ley, no en sus excepciones. Pero ¿a cuántos portadores de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} ve respetando la ley? ¡A ninguno!».
languages.original_text: "For the good of the sector, Rogue Traders must become paragons of the law, not exceptions to it. But do many {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} holders exhibit lawful conduct? No, they do not!"

traits.locale_text: «Por el bien del sector, los Comerciantes Independientes deben convertirse en ejemplares de la ley, no en sus excepciones. Pero ¿a cuántos portadores de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} ve respetando la ley? ¡A ninguno!».

languages.text: « Pour le bien de ce secteur, les libres-marchands doivent agir comme des parangons de vertu, mais les détenteurs de {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettres de marque{/g} se montrent-ils respectueux des lois ? Non, jamais ! »
languages.original_text: "For the good of the sector, Rogue Traders must become paragons of the law, not exceptions to it. But do many {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} holders exhibit lawful conduct? No, they do not!"

traits.locale_text: « Pour le bien de ce secteur, les libres-marchands doivent agir comme des parangons de vertu, mais les détenteurs de {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettres de marque{/g} se montrent-ils respectueux des lois ? Non, jamais ! »

languages.text: "Zum Wohle des Sektors müssen Freihändler Musterbeispiele für das Gesetz sein, keine Ausnahmen. Aber verhalten sich Träger des {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefs{/g} gesetzeskonform? Nein, tun sie nicht!"
languages.original_text: "For the good of the sector, Rogue Traders must become paragons of the law, not exceptions to it. But do many {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} holders exhibit lawful conduct? No, they do not!"

traits.locale_text: "Zum Wohle des Sektors müssen Freihändler Musterbeispiele für das Gesetz sein, keine Ausnahmen. Aber verhalten sich Träger des {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefs{/g} gesetzeskonform? Nein, tun sie nicht!"

languages.text: "Bu sektörün hayrı için Hür Tacirler yasalardan muaf olmamalı, aksine yasalara harfiyen uymalı. Peki ya {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g} hamillerinin çoğu, yasalara uygun hareket ediyor mu? Katiyen hayır!"
languages.original_text: "For the good of the sector, Rogue Traders must become paragons of the law, not exceptions to it. But do many {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} holders exhibit lawful conduct? No, they do not!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu sektörün hayrı için Hür Tacirler yasalardan muaf olmamalı, aksine yasalara harfiyen uymalı. Peki ya {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g} sahiplerinin çoğu, yasalara uygun hareket ediyor mu? Katiyen hayır!"
